message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  How about $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about $105?
Alice, $105 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm happy to pay $95.  What do you think?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. How about $102?
